extension.description: The Justifer is a light gun released by Konami in 1992 for the Sega Mega Drive/Genesis, SNES and PlayStation. It resembles the Colt Python, a .357 Magnum revolver.
El Justifer es una pistola ligera lanzada por Konami en 1992 para Sega Mega Drive / Genesis, SNES y PlayStation. Se parece al Colt Python, un revólver Magnum .357.
